name: spss
description: SPSS is a coding language that generates CSS. ## Start coding > START. BEFORE STARTING CODING PLEASE INSTALL PYTHON. > 1. To start coding SPSS you need to open the folder "CODE". > 2. Open the ".spss" file. > 3. Start coding in that file. > 4. To generate the CSS, open the "GENERATE" shortcut. > 5. Look in the file "generated.css".
